706295f-a.text:
30-50 Plaza Street, east side, as seen across clearing from St. John's Place. No. 50 is in the foreground, and at the N.E. corner of Butler Place.

August 29, 1930

P.L. Sperr.

706295f-a.original_title: Brooklyn: Plaza Street - St. Johns Place
